item.description:
This  is  a great single or family Christmas concert, if there is any interest email me so that we can coordinate sitting together, I have seen this before and it was awesome, we can do dinner before hand, RSVP must be firm. Maybe we can do a group sales, I will check it out.

So that we can sit together I will be happy to place it on my credit card, you must mail me a check, these sell so we cannot procrastinate,  once purchased I will send you a confirmation number, there will be no refunds so be firm. The cost of a ticket is 41.00. If I get 15 people signed up then it would be 36.00. I need a check by "November 11th" in the amont of 41.00, and if we get 15 people I will refund you 5.00 the day of the event. I have this posted on several sights.

Lets Meet at 5PM

 MARGARITAS RESTAURANT 

1037 Elm Street
603-647-7717

 and then head out at 7pm to the parking lot across the street from the Arena, bring some cash for that.

 

Boston Pops Holiday Concert
Date:Saturday, December 17, 2011
Time: 7:30 PM Seating Chart  Section 201 LEVEL D&E UPPER LEVEL 4&5 ROW 
         Verizon Arena: Call us at 603-644-5000   ext 6008

    

Boston Pops Holiday Concert

The Boston Pops return to Manchester for a must see holiday concert on December 17th!

Kick off your holiday season with Keith Lockhart, the Boston Pops, and vocal powerhouse Rockapella! For the first time ever, "America's Orchestra" joins America's leading a capella group for an unforgettable holiday show.

Enjoy unique takes on classic favorites and brand new originals, plus a special visit from Jolly Old' St. Nick and a time-honored audience sing along. Treat yourself and your loved ones to a holiday tradition that millions cherish!

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Pops Holiday Concert Verizon Manchester Arena
